infos.value: You've quite underestimated what I am capable of!
But your story is ending now.
I will mince you, grind you up, and use what is left to feed my beasts.
Heh. I would love to see you try!
What a dim-witted fool you are. Behold our numbers!
Urgh... There are too many of them...
If we don't break through their ranks...
Then we will not hold out for very long.
The choice seems fairly clear, then.
Believe in yourself...and believe in your fellow fighters!
